comment: * Information you can retrieve about any processes that are in an error condition.

variables.name: condition
variables.comment: * The condition that the process is in.

variables.name: processName
variables.comment: * The process name in which the crash or error occurred.

variables.name: pid
variables.comment: * The pid of this process; 0 if none

variables.name: uid
tag
variables.comment: * The activity name associated with the error, if known.  May be null.

variables.name: shortMsg
variables.comment: * A short message describing the error condition.

variables.name: longMsg
variables.comment: * A long message describing the error condition.

variables.name: stackTrace
variables.comment: * The stack trace where the error originated.  May be null.

variables.name: crashData
variables.comment: * to be deprecated: This value will always be null.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
